argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | itg1addlem.1 | |- ( ph -> F : X --> Y ) |
| 2 |  | itg1addlem.2 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | itg1addlem.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B C_ ( `' F " { k } ) ) |
| 4 |  | itg1addlem.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. dom vol ) |
| 5 |  | itg1addlem.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( vol ` B ) e. RR ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_jca | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( B e. dom vol /\ ( vol ` B ) e. RR ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. k e. A ( B e. dom vol /\ ( vol ` B ) e. RR ) ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_adantrr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A /\ x e. B ) ) -> B C_ ( `' F " { k } ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A /\ x e. B ) ) -> x e. B ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A /\ x e. B ) ) -> x e. ( `' F " { k } ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( F : X --> Y -> F Fn X ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F Fn X ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A /\ x e. B ) ) -> F Fn X ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fniniseg | |- ( F Fn X -> ( x e. ( `' F " { k } ) <-> ( x e. X /\ ( F ` x ) = k ) ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A /\ x e. B ) ) -> ( x e. ( `' F " { k } ) <-> ( x e. X /\ ( F ` x ) = k ) ) ) |
| 16 | 10, 15 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A /\ x e. B ) ) -> ( x e. X /\ ( F ` x ) = k ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( k e. A /\ x e. B ) ) -> ( F ` x ) = k ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_ralrimivva | |- ( ph -> A. k e. A A. x e. B ( F ` x ) = k ) |
| 19 |  | #P_invdisj | |- ( A. k e. A A. x e. B ( F ` x ) = k -> Disj_ k e. A B ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> Disj_ k e. A B ) |
| 21 |  | #P_volfiniun | |- ( ( A e. Fin /\ A. k e. A ( B e. dom vol /\ ( vol ` B ) e. RR ) /\ Disj_ k e. A B ) -> ( vol ` U_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( vol ` B ) ) |
| 22 | 2, 7, 20, 21 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( vol ` U_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( vol ` B ) ) |
